name: Planet Oasis
description:
Help the inhabitants of "Planet Oasis" to combat the drought that has devastated their home by digging up the ground for precious water!

Submission for the  Mini Jame Gam #15     2023

Theme: Together

Special Object: Shovel

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space / Enter  - Interact

Credits:

Nevereven: Music

Mafe: Art

Valle: SFX

Bleda: Programming / Game design
